title: Expensive-Looking Apartment Décor Items Under $30 2019
text:
Home décor — for the price of a Sweetgreen salad. Photo: Courtesy the retailer

Turns out you don’t need to schlep to Ikea to find cheap bowls, trash cans, water pitchers, or dish towels. Amazon is actually full of handsome and well-priced home décor — you just have to do a little digging. Which is what we did so you don’t have to. Below, the fuzzy pillows and metal napkin holders that are under $30 (and in most cases under $20). If you’re looking for some cheap decorating ideas for the bathroom, bedroom, or kitchen as well, we went and found a bunch of those on Amazon.

Now House by Jonathan Adler Facet Trinket Decorative Tray You can store trinkets in this geometric dish or keep it in your entryway to corral keys and spare change. $16 at Amazon Buy $16 at Amazon Buy

4th Emotion Set of 2 Farmhouse Buffalo Check Plaid Throw Pillow Covers Update your throw pillows with these buffalo check cases that are perfect for fall, but honestly would work year-round. $15 at Amazon Buy $15 at Amazon Buy

5mm Paper Round Beech Wood Wall Closet Coat Hook/Hanger with Leather Strap This natural wood and leather hook would be right at home in a pared-down Shaker-style space. $19 at Amazon Buy $19 at Amazon Buy

Stone & Beam Modern Oval Pattern Decorative Stoneware Vase $25 (was $29, now 14% off) Great for displaying a bouquet of flowers, and nice enough to keep out on its own. $25 at Amazon Buy $25 at Amazon Buy

Yamazaki home Tower-Ladle & Lid Stand A home for your ladles and spoons, so you don’t get tomato sauce all over the kitchen. You can also fit your favorite cookbook. $17 at Amazon Buy $17 at Amazon Buy

Areaware BRBOBTO Nail Bottle Opener A bottle opener that’s magnetized — you won’t be embarrassed to stick it to your fridge. $12 at Amazon Buy $12 at Amazon Buy

Photo: Courtesy of the vendor Yamazaki Home Silicone Soap Tray Plop this on a bathtub ledge, and your soap setup will be a whole lot less grubby. Will look particularly nice with this Wary Meyers bar. $21 at Amazon Buy $21 at Amazon Buy

Photo: Courtesy of the vendor Dar Living Metal Side Table Okay, this is $30, but it’s such a great little side table that we had to stick it on here. Place a lamp on it, your Amy’s tortellini bowl, or a Roku remote. $30 at Amazon Buy $30 at Amazon Buy

Calypso Basics Marble Enamel Utensil Holder It seems 1970s-era “splatterware” is having a bit of a moment; it also happens to be very affordable. This long vessel can be used to store your kitchen utensils and would make a nice pop of color on your countertop. $18 at Amazon Buy $18 at Amazon Buy

description: The best affordable apartment décor items, including a cheap watering can, soap dish, and milk jug. All of them are under the low price of $30.
